job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you passionate about leveraging the power of artificial intelligence and machine learning to drive innovation and create impactful solutions? Join our dynamic software company as we expand our team to explore new frontiers in AI technology. We're seeking a talented AI Engineer to collaborate with us on customer projects, lead face-to-face workshops, and contribute to the discovery of cutting-edge GenAI products from Google Cloud.

   Profile

   As an AI Engineer, you'll play a key role in driving AI initiatives within our organization. Your responsibilities will include:
     * Collaborating with customers to understand their AI needs and requirements, assisting the customer to understanding the impact of Generative AI in their business, and making concrete and informed decisions on implementation.
     * Leading face-to-face workshops and training sessions to educate customers on AI technologies and best practices.
     * Developing and implementing AI solutions and POCs tailored to customer projects, ensuring high quality and efficiency.
     * Conducting research and exploration of new AI products and services offered by Google Cloud's GenAI platform.
     * Working closely with cross-functional teams to integrate AI capabilities into our products and services.
     * Providing technical expertise and guidance on AI-related projects and initiatives.
job_details.full_text:
Medior AI Engineer

Are you passionate about leveraging the power of artificial intelligence and machine learning to drive innovation and create impactful solutions? Join our dynamic software company as we expand our team to explore new frontiers in AI technology. We're seeking a talented AI Engineer to collaborate with us on customer projects, lead face-to-face workshops, and contribute to the discovery of cutting-edge GenAI products from Google Cloud.

   Profile

   As an AI Engineer, you'll play a key role in driving AI initiatives within our organization. Your responsibilities will include:
     * Collaborating with customers to understand their AI needs and requirements, assisting the customer to understanding the impact of Generative AI in their business, and making concrete and informed decisions on implementation.
     * Leading face-to-face workshops and training sessions to educate customers on AI technologies and best practices.
     * Developing and implementing AI solutions and POCs tailored to customer projects, ensuring high quality and efficiency.
     * Conducting research and exploration of new AI products and services offered by Google Cloud's GenAI platform.
     * Working closely with cross-functional teams to integrate AI capabilities into our products and services.
     * Providing technical expertise and guidance on AI-related projects and initiatives.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes working with Generative AI products from Google Cloud, developing AI solutions and POCs, and integrating AI capabilities. While it mentions AI and ML broadly, the specific focus on GenAI and customer-facing applications aligns best with the GenAI Engineer profile.

phrases: Collaborating with customers to understand their AI needs and requirements
assisting the customer to understanding the impact of Generative AI in their business
making concrete and informed decisions on implementation
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a need to grasp customer business goals, understand how GenAI can address them, and translate that into actionable implementation plans.

phrases: Developing and implementing AI solutions and POCs tailored to customer projects
Conducting research and exploration of new AI products and services offered by Google Cloud's GenAI platform
job_tasks.justification: This involves creating and adapting AI models (solutions and POCs) and exploring new generative AI technologies, which falls under the modeling category.

phrases: integrate AI capabilities into our products and services
job_tasks.justification: This task requires the development and integration of AI features into existing or new software products, a core aspect of software development.

phrases: ensuring high quality and efficiency
job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly mentioning MLOps tools, the emphasis on 'high quality and efficiency' in developing and implementing solutions implies a need for robust deployment and operational considerations.
